mission.posting: Finish a job one of our users left uncompleted.

email.subject: Continuations
email.body:
One of our fellow users was completing a mission when they had to leave for personal reasons. I don't hold it against them that it was personal, but we need this mission to be finished as soon as possible. I'm setting the task to you. Let's see how well you can perform.
Remove all degrees of the person Jean-Luc Stevenson.
